short_summary: Estimated quantity of commodity: 48 Duration of contract: 2023-04-01 to 2024-03-31 Notice of proposed procurement from Department of National Defence for 2 safety relief valves.
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax. Item 1, GSIN: 4820, NSN: 01-210-4144, VALVE, SAFETY RELIEF Part No.: YB2385D225, NCAGE: 35795 Quantity: 24, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt. Item 2, GSIN: 4820, NSN: 01-210-4144, VALVE, SAFETY RELIEF Part No.: YB2385D225, NCAGE: 35795 Quantity: 24, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Halifax. Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering. Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected. The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
